Amazing game, however it can be a very toxic community. Ive played games with some of the most toxic communities such as Rust, and this game is for sure up there in terms of toxicness. If you decide to get this game, I suggest staying away from ranked for awhile. Have fun!
Lot of toxic players, cheaters, etc...but i still recommend.
